mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, s.password AS password, s.studentId AS studentId, s.step AS step, s.type AS type, s.registeredAt AS registeredAt, m.id AS "major.id", m.name AS "major.name" FROM somday.Student as s JOIN somday.Major as m ON s.studentId=#{studentId} AND s.major = m.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Student (id, name, password, studentId, major, phone) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{encryptedPw}, #{encryptedStudentId}, #{majorId}, #{encryptedPhone})
